abstract: Adds an action to perform after the user double-taps their Apple Pencil.

declaration.code: nonisolated func onPencilDoubleTap(perform action: @escaping (PencilDoubleTapGestureValue) -> Void) -> some View

overview:
## Return Value

A view that performs `action` after the user double-taps their Apple Pencil.

## Discussion

You should respect people’s setting for the double-tap gesture by reading the [doc://com.apple.SwiftUI/documentation/SwiftUI/EnvironmentValues/preferredPencilDoubleTapAction] environment value, if the setting makes sense in your app. If it doesn’t, consider giving people a way to specify custom behavior in your app instead.

In the example below, double-tapping an Apple Pencil will…

For more information about Apple Pencil double-tap gestures, see [https://developer.apple.com/design/human-interface-guidelines/apple-pencil-and-scribble#Double-tap].
